document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of the Street of Whispers and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Street of Whispers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Street of Whispers''' was a road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Street of Whispers was located in the western section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It ran roughly north to south, originating on the [[Street of Glances]] where it branched south and eventually ended with [[Seawatch Street]] on [[Dob's Loss]]. The Street of Whispers was also intersected by [[Diamond Street]], [[Grimwald's Way]], [[Shark Street]], [[Gondwatch Lane]], [[Ivory Street]], [[Moonstar Alley]], and [[Sharra's Flight]].
